content.title: 5. Mahārathavaggo
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
content.gathalast: Abhikkantena vaṇṇena, sabbā obhāsayaṃ disā’’ti.
Tava dhammaṃ suṇantassa, avadhī vacchapālako.
Ānubhāvañca me passa, vaṇṇaṃ passa jutiñca me.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ye ca te dīghamaddhānaṃ, dhammaṃ assosuṃ gotama;
content.gathalast: Pattā te acalaṭṭhānaṃ, yattha gantvā na socare’’ti.
content.gatha1: dha. pa. 219 dhammapade ‘‘Cirappavāsiṃ purisaṃ, dūrato sotthimāgataṃ;
content.gathalast: Ñātimittā suhajjā ca, abhinandanti āgataṃ;
content.gatha1: dha. pa. 220 dhammapade ‘‘Tatheva katapuññampi, asmā lokā paraṃ gataṃ;
content.gathalast: Puññāni paṭigaṇhanti, piyaṃ ñātīva āgataṃ.
content.gatha1: pe. va. 714‘‘Uṭṭhehi revate supāpadhamme, apārubhaṃ dvāraṃapārubhaṃ dvāraṃapārutadvāreapārutadvāraṃapārutadvāraṃ adānasīle;
content.gathalast: Nessāma taṃ yattha thunanti duggatā, samappitā nerayikā dukkhenā’’ti.
content.gatha1: Iccevaiccevaṃiccevaṃ vatvāna yamassa dūtā, te dve yakkhā lohitakkhā brahantā;
content.gathalast: Paccekabāhāsu gahetvā revataṃ, pakkāmayuṃ devagaṇassa santike.
Kassetamākiṇṇajanaṃ vimānaṃ, sūriyassa raṃsīriva jotamānaṃ.
Taṃ dissati sūriyasamānavaṇṇaṃ, ko modati saggapatto vimāne’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Bārāṇasiyaṃ nandiyo nāmāsi, upāsako amaccharī dānapati vadaññū;
content.gathalast: Tassetamākiṇṇajanaṃ vimānaṃ, sūriyassa raṃsīriva jotamānaṃ.
Taṃ dissati sūriyasamānavaṇṇaṃ, so modati saggapatto vimāne’’ti.
Bhattu vimāne ramissāmi dānahaṃ, na patthaye nirayaṃ dassanāyā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Eso te nirayo supāpadhamme, puññaṃ tayā akataṃ jīvaloke;
content.gathalast: Na hi maccharī rosako pāpadhammo, saggūpagānaṃ labhati sahabyata’’nti.
Duggandhaṃ kimidaṃ mīḷhaṃ, kimetaṃ upavāyatī’’ti.
Yattha vassasahassāni, tuvaṃ paccasi revate’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ;
content.gathalast: Kena saṃsavako laddho, gambhīro sataporiso’’ti.
Musāvādena vañcesi, taṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ tayā.
Tattha vassasahassāni, tuvaṃ paccasi revate.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Hatthepi chindanti athopi pāde, kaṇṇepi chindanti athopi nāsaṃ;
content.gathalast: Athopi kākoḷagaṇā samecca, saṅgamma khādanti viphandamāna’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sādhu kho maṃ paṭinetha, kāhāmi kusalaṃ bahuṃ;
content.gatha2: Dānena samacariyāya, saṃyamena damena ca;
content.gathalast: Yaṃ katvā sukhitā honti, na ca pacchānutappare’’ti.
Sayaṃ katānaṃ kammānaṃ, vipākaṃ anubhossasī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ko devalokato manussalokaṃ, gantvāna puṭṭho me evaṃ vadeyya;
content.gatha2: ‘Nikkhittadaṇḍesu dadātha dānaṃ, acchādanaṃ seyya sayana (sī.) mathannapānaṃ;
content.gathalast: Nahi maccharī rosako pāpadhammo, saggūpagānaṃ labhati sahabyataṃ’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sāhaṃ nūna ito gantvā, yoniṃ laddhāna mānusiṃ;
content.gatha2: Vadaññū sīlasampannā, kāhāmi kusalaṃ bahuṃ;
content.gathalast: Dānena samacariyāya, saṃyamena damena ca.
Papañca udapānañca, vippasannena cetasā.
Pāṭihāriyapakkhañca, aṭṭhaṅgasusamāgataṃ.
Na ca dāne pamajjissaṃ, sāmaṃ diṭṭhamidaṃ mayā’’ti;
Khipiṃsu niraye ghore, uddhapādaṃ avaṃsiraṃ.
Vitathena ca sāmikaṃ vañcayitvā, paccāmahaṃ niraye ghorarūpe’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ye vadataṃ pavaro manujesu, sakyamunī bhagavā katakicco;
content.gathalast: Pāragato balavīriyasamaṅgībalavīrasamaṅgī , taṃ sugataṃ saraṇatthamupehi.
Madhuramimaṃ paguṇaṃ suvibhattaṃ, dhammamimaṃ saraṇatthamupehi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yattha ca dinna mahapphalamāhu, catūsu sucīsu purisayugesu;
content.gathalast: Aṭṭha ca puggaladhammadasā te, saṅghamimaṃ saraṇatthamupehi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na tathā tapati nabhe sūriyo, cando ca na bhāsati na phusso;
content.gathalast: Yathā atulamidaṃ mahappabhāsaṃ, ko nu tvaṃ tidivā mahiṃ upāgā.
Rattimapi yathā divaṃ karoti, parisuddhaṃ vimalaṃ subhaṃ vimānaṃ.
Arajavirajahemajālachannaṃ, ākāse tapati yathāpi sūriyo.
Kañcanatanusannibhattacāhi, paripūraṃ gaganaṃva tārakāhi.
Anilapamuñcitā pavantipavāyanti surabhiṃ, tapaniyavitatā suvaṇṇachannāsuvaṇṇacchādanā .
Yathā ca te adhigatamidaṃ vimānaṃ, tadanupadaṃ avacāsi iṅgha puṭṭho’’ti.
Tava ratanavarassa dhammaṃ sutvā, karissāmīti ca bravittha chatto.
Noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃavocāhaṃavocāhaṃavocāhaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ.
content.gatha2: Na hi pāṇesu asaññataṃ avaṇṇayiṃsu sappaññā;
content.gathalast: Pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mā ca parajanassa rakkhitampi, ādātabbamamaññitho mamaññittha (sī. pī.) adinnaṃ;
content.gathalast: Noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mā ca parajanassa rakkhitāyo, parabhariyā agamā anariyametaṃ;
content.gathalast: Noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ;
content.gatha2: Na hi musāvādaṃ avaṇṇayiṃsu sappaññā;
content.gathalast: Noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yena ca purisassa apeti saññā, taṃ majjaṃ parivajjayassu sabbaṃ;
content.gathalast: Noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Svāhaṃ idha pañca sikkhā karitvā, paṭipajjitvā tathāgatassa dhamme;
content.gathalast: Dvepathamagamāsiṃ coramajjhe, te maṃ tattha vadhiṃsu bhogahetu.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ettakamidaṃ anussarāmi kusalaṃ, tato paraṃ na me vijjati aññaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tena sucaritena kammunāhaṃkammanāhaṃ , uppannoupapanno tidivesu kāmakāmī.
Jalamiva yasasā samekkhamānā, bahukā maṃ pihayanti hīnakammā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Passa katipayāya desanāya, sugatiñcamhi gato sukhañca patto;
content.gathalast: Ye ca te satataṃ suṇanti dhammaṃ, maññe te amataṃ phusanti khemaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Appampi kataṃ mahāvipākaṃ, vipulaṃ hoti vipulaphalaṃ (ka.) tathāgatassa dhamme;
content.gathalast: Passa katapuññatāya chatto, obhāseti pathaviṃ yathāpi sūriyo.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kimidaṃ kusalaṃ kimācarema, icceke hi samecca mantayanti;
content.gathalast: Te mayaṃ punarevapunapi laddha mānusattaṃ, paṭipannā viharemu sīlavanto.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Bahukāro anukampako ca satthā, iti me sati agamā divā divassa;
content.gathalast: Svāhaṃ upagatomhi saccanāmaṃ, anukampassu punapi suṇemu suṇoma (sī.), suṇomi (syā.) dhammaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ye cidhayedhayedhayedhaye idha pajahanti kāmarāgaṃ, bhavarāgānusayañca pahāya mohaṃ;
content.gathalast: Na ca te punamupenti gabbhaseyyaṃ, parinibbānagatā hi sītibhūtā’’ti.
Kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatāruciratthatāruciratthatā subhā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tatthacchasi pivasi khādasi ca, dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃvagguvagguvaggū ;
content.gathalast: Dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañca, nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇachannā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kena tetādiso vaṇṇo, kena te idha mijjhati;
content.gathalast: Uppajjanti ca te bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Pucchāmi taṃ deva mahānubhāva, manussabhūto kimakāsi puññaṃ;
content.gathalast: Kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti.
Pañhaṃ puṭṭho viyākāsi, yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ.
Niṭṭhito jātarūpassa, sobhati dasapādako.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tena metādiso vaṇṇo, tena me idha mijjhati;
content.gathalast: Uppajjanti ca me bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Akkhāmi te bhikkhu mahānubhāva, manussabhūto yamakāsi puññaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tenamhi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti.
Kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā.

content.gathalast: Dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañca, nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇachannā.

content.gathalast: Kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā.

content.gathalast: Dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañca, nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇachannā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kena tetādiso vaṇṇo…pe… vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti.
So devaputto attamano…pe… yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ.
content.gathalast: Sammaggatesu bhikkhūsu, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
Tattha cittaṃ pasādetvā, tāvatiṃsūpago ahaṃ.
Vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti.

content.gathalast: Dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañca, nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇachannā.

So devaputto attamano…pe… yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ.
content.gatha2: Yañceva dajjā tañceva seyyo;
content.gathalast: Sūci dinnā sūcimeva seyyo.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tena metādiso vaṇṇo…pe… vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti.
content.gathalast: Kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā.

content.gathalast: Dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañca, nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇachannā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kena tetādiso vaṇṇo…pe… vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti.
So devaputto attamano…pe… yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ.
content.gathalast: Tassa adāsahaṃ sūciṃ, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tena metādiso vaṇṇo…pe…vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti.
‘‘Susukkakhandhaṃ abhiruyha nāgaṃ, akācinaṃ dantiṃ baliṃ mahājavaṃ;
content.gathalast: Abhiruyha gajavaraṃgajaṃ varaṃ sukappitaṃ, idhāgamā vehāyasaṃ antalikkhe.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Nāgassa dantesu duvesu nimmitā, acchodakā paduminiyo suphullā;
content.gathalast: Padumesu ca turiyagaṇā pavajjare, imā ca naccanti manoharāyo.
Kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti.
Pañhaṃ puṭṭho viyākāsi, yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ.
Thūpasmiṃ abhiropesiṃ, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tena metādiso vaṇṇo…pe…vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti.
content.gatha2: Vanā vanaṃ anupariyāsi, nārīgaṇapurakkhato;
content.gathalast: Obhāsento disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kena tetādiso vaṇṇo…pe…vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti.
content.gathalast: Pañhaṃ puṭṭho viyākāsi, yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ.
Pāṇātipātā virato ahosiṃ, loke adinnaṃ parivajjayissaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Amajjapo no ca musā abhāṇiṃabhāsiṃabhāsiṃ , sakena dārena ca tuṭṭho ahosiṃ;
content.gathalast: Annañca pānañca pasannacitto, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adāsiṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tena metādiso vaṇṇo…pe…vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti.
content.gathalast: Turiyatāḷitanigghoso, antalikkhe mahīyati.
Ajānantā taṃ pucchāma, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Namhi devo na gandhabbo, nāpināmhi sakko purindado;
content.gathalast: Sudhammā nāma ye devā, tesaṃ aññataro aha’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Pucchāma devaṃ sudhammaṃdeva sudhammadeva sudhammaṃ , puthuṃ katvāna añjaliṃ;
content.gathalast: Kiṃ katvā mānuse kammaṃ, sudhammaṃ upapajjatī’’ti.
Tiṇṇaṃ aññataraṃ datvā, sudhammaṃ upapajjatī’’ti.
Khattiyo nusi rājañño, adu luddo vanecaro’’tivanācaro’’tivanācaro’’ti .
Nāmaṃ me bhikkhu te brūmi, sujāto iti maṃ vidūviduṃ .
Migaṃ tañcevamigaṃ gantvevamigavadhañca nāddakkhiṃ, tañca disvā ṭhito aha’’nti.
Etto udakamādāya, pāde pakkhālayassu te.
Rājaputta tato pitvāpītvāpītvā , santhatasmiṃ upāvisā’’ti.
Nelā atthavatīcatthavatī vaggu, mantvāmantāmantāmantā atthañca bhāsasibhāsase .
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kā te rati vane viharato, isinisabha vadehi puṭṭho;
content.gathalast: Tava vacanapathaṃ nisāmayitvā, atthadhammapadaṃ samācaremase’’ti.
Theyyā ca aticārā ca, majjapānā ca ārati.
Diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃsā, dhammā ete pasaṃsiyāti.
Rājaputta vijānāhi, attānaṃ parimocayā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Katamaṃ svāhaṃ janapadaṃ gantvā, kiṃ kammaṃ kiñca porisaṃ;
content.gathalast: Kāya vā pana vijjāya, bhaveyyaṃ ajarāmaro’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na vijjate so padeso, kammaṃ vijjā ca porisaṃ;
content.gathalast: Yattha gantvā bhave macco, rājaputtājarāmaro.
Pahūtadhanadhaññāse, tepi notepi na ajarāmarā.
Tepi āyukkhayaṃ pattā, viddhastā sassatīsamā.
Ete caññe ca jātiyā, tepi no ajarāmarā.
Ete caññe ca vijjāya, tepi no ajarāmarā.
Sarīraṃ tepi kālena, vijahanti tapassino.
Nikkhipanti imaṃ dehaṃ, puññapāpaparikkhayā’’ti.
Nijjhattomhi subhaṭṭhena, tvañca me saraṇaṃ bhavā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mā maṃ tvaṃ saraṇaṃ gaccha, tameva saraṇaṃ vajabhaja ;
content.gathalast: Sakyaputtaṃ mahāvīraṃ, yamahaṃ saraṇaṃ gato’’ti.
Ahampi daṭṭhuṃ gacchissaṃ, jinaṃ appaṭipuggala’’nti.
Tatthāsi purisājañño, so ca kho parinibbuto’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sace hi buddho tiṭṭheyya, satthā tumhāka mārisa;
content.gathalast: Yojanāni sahassāni, gaccheyyaṃgacchegacchegacche payirupāsituṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yato ca khoyatā khoyatā kho parinibbuto, satthā tumhāka mārisa;
content.gathalast: Nibbutampi parinibbutaṃ (syā. ka.) mahāvīraṃ, gacchāmi saraṇaṃ ahaṃ.
Saṅghañca naradevassa, gacchāmi saraṇaṃ ahaṃ.
Amajjapo no ca musā bhaṇāmi, sakena dārena ca homi tuṭṭho’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sahassaraṃsīva yathā mahappabho, disaṃ yathā bhāti nabhe anukkamaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tathāpakārotathappakārotathappakāro tavāyaṃtavayaṃtavayaṃ mahāratho, samantato yojanasattamāyato.
Lekhā suvaṇṇassa ca rūpiyassa ca, sobhenti veḷuriyamayā sunimmitā.
Yuttā suvaṇṇassa ca rūpiyassa ca, sobhanti assā ca ime manojavā.
Pucchāmi tāhaṃ yasavanta kovidaṃkovida , kathaṃ tayā laddho ayaṃ uḷāro’’ti.
Tvañca maṃ anukampāya, saññamasmiṃ nivesayi.
Imaṃ sujāta pūjehi, taṃ te atthāya hehiti.
Pahāya mānusaṃ dehaṃ, upapannomhi nandanaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Nandane ca vanenandanopavanenandane pavanenandane pavane ramme, nānādijagaṇāyute;
content.gathalast: Ramāmi naccagītehi, accharāhi purakkhato’’ti.
Uyyānabhūmiṃ abhito anukkamaṃ, purindado bhūtapatīva vāsavo.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sovaṇṇamayā te rathakubbarā ubho, phalehithalehi aṃsehi atīva saṅgatā;
content.gathalast: Sujātagumbā naravīraniṭṭhitā, virocatī pannaraseva cando.
Sunandighoso ca subhassaro ca, virocatī cāmarahatthabāhubhi.
Imā ca nābhyo satarājicittitā, sateratā vijjurivappabhāsare.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Anekacittāvatato ratho ayaṃ, puthū ca nemī ca sahassaraṃsiko;
content.gathalast: Tesaṃ saro suyyatisūyati vaggurūpo, pañcaṅgikaṃ turiyamivappavāditaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sirasmiṃ cittaṃ maṇicandakappitaṃ, sadā visuddhaṃ ruciraṃ pabhassaraṃ;
content.gathalast: Suvaṇṇarājīhi atīva saṅgataṃ, veḷuriyarājīva atīva sobhati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ime ca vāḷī maṇicandakappitā, ārohakambū sujavā brahūpamā.
content.gathalast: Brahā mahantā balino mahājavā, mano tavaññāya tatheva siṃsaresabbaresappare .

Ramenti taṃ mahiddhikaṃ, vasavattīva modasi.

content.gatha1: ‘‘Dibbā te vividhā rūpā, dibbā saddā atho rasā;
content.gathalast: Gandhā ca te adhippetā, phoṭṭhabbā ca manoramā.
Atirocasi vaṇṇena, udayantova bhāṇumā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Dānassa te idaṃ phalaṃ, atho sīlassa vā pana;
content.gathalast: Atho añjalikammassa, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito’’.
content.gatha1: So devaputto attamano…pe… yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ.
content.gathalast: Suddhodanassa puttassa, kaṇḍako sahajo ahaṃ.
So maṃ mudūhi pāṇīhi, jālijāla tambanakhehi ca.
Ahaṃ lokaṃ tārayissaṃ, patto sambodhimuttamaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ me giraṃ suṇantassa, hāso me vipulo ahu;
content.gathalast: Udaggacitto sumano, abhisīsiṃabhisiṃsiṃabhisīsi tadā ahaṃ.
Udaggacitto mudito, vahissaṃ purisuttamaṃ.
Mamaṃ channañca ohāya, anapekkho so apakkami.
Gacchantañca mahāvīraṃ, rudamāno udikkhisaṃ.
Alatthaṃ garukābādhaṃ, khippaṃ me maraṇaṃ ahu.
Sabbakāmaguṇopetaṃ , dibbaṃ devapuramhi ca.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yañca me ahuvā hāso, saddaṃ sutvāna bodhiyā;
content.gathalast: Teneva kusalamūlena, phusissaṃ āsavakkhayaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sace hi bhante gaccheyyāsi, satthu buddhassa santike;
content.gathalast: Mamāpi naṃ vacanena, sirasā vajjāsi vandanaṃ.
Dullabhaṃ dassanaṃ hoti, lokanāthāna tādina’’nti.
Sutvā giraṃ cakkhumato, dhammacakkhuṃ visodhayi.
Vanditvā satthuno pāde, tatthevantaradhāyathātitatthevantaradhāyatīti .
Parivārito accharāsaṅgaṇena, sunimmito bhūtapatīva modasi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Samassamo natthi kuto panuttaro uttari (ka.), yasena puññena ca iddhiyā ca;
content.gatha2: Sabbe ca devā tidasagaṇā samecca, taṃ taṃ namassanti sasiṃva devā;
content.gathalast: Imā ca te accharāyo samantato, naccanti gāyanti pamodayanti.
Kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti.
content.gatha1: So devaputto attamano…pe… yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ.
‘‘Ahaṃ bhadante ahuvāsi pubbe, sumedhanāmassa jinassa sāvako;
content.gathalast: Puthujjano anavabodhohamasmiṃananubodhohamasmiananubodhohamāsiṃ , so satta vassāni paribbajissahaṃpabbajissahaṃpabbajissahaṃpabbajisāhaṃ .
Ratanuccayaṃ hemajālena channaṃ, vanditvā thūpasmiṃ manaṃ pasādayiṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na māsi dānaṃ na ca matthi dātuṃ, pare ca kho tattha samādapesiṃ;
content.gathalast: Pūjetha naṃ pūjanīyassapūjaneyyassapūjaneyyassa dhātuṃ, evaṃ kira saggamito gamissatha.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tadeva kammaṃ kusalaṃ kataṃ mayā, sukhañca dibbaṃ anubhomi attanā;
content.gathalast: Modāmahaṃ tidasagaṇassa majjhe, na tassa puññassa khayampi ajjhaga’’nti.
Bāhā paggayha kandasi, vanamajjhe kiṃ dukkhito tuva’’nti.
Tassa cakkayugaṃ na vindāmi, tena dukkhena jahissaṃjahāmijahissāmijahissāmi jīvita’’nti.
Ācikkhaācikkhatha me bhaddamāṇava, cakkayugaṃ paṭipādayāmi te’’ti.
content.gatha1: So māṇavo tassa pāvadi, ‘‘candimasūriyā ubhayettha dissare;
content.gathalast: Sovaṇṇamayo ratho mama, tena cakkayugena sobhatī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Bālo kho tvaṃ asi māṇava, yo tvaṃ patthayase apatthiyaṃ;
content.gathalast: Maññāmi tuvaṃ marissasi, na hi tvaṃ lacchasi candimasūriye’’ti.
Petopeto panapeto pana kālakato na dissati, ko nidha kandataṃ bālyataro’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Saccaṃ kho vadesi māṇava, ahameva kandataṃ bālyataro;
content.gathalast: Candaṃ viya dārako rudaṃ, petaṃ kālakatābhipatthayi’’nti.
Vārinā viya osiñcaṃ, sabbaṃ nibbāpaye daraṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Abbahī abbūḷha (pī.), abbūḷhaṃ (syā. ka.) vata me sallaṃ, sokaṃ hadayanissitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Yo me sokaparetassa, puttasokaṃ apānudi.
Na socāmi na rodāmi, vata sutvāna māṇavāti.
Ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yañcayaṃ kandasi yañca rodasi, puttaṃ āḷāhane sayaṃ dahitvā;
content.gathalast: Svāhaṃ kusalaṃ karitvā kammaṃ, tidasānaṃ sahabyataṃ gato’’tipatto’’tipatto’’tipatto’’ti .
content.gatha1: ‘‘Appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā nāddasāma, dānaṃ dadantassa sake agāre;
content.gathalast: Uposathakammaṃ vā uposathakammañca (ka.) tādisaṃ, kena kammena gatosi devaloka’’nti.
Buddhaṃ vigatarajaṃ vitiṇṇakaṅkhaṃ, addakkhiṃ sugataṃ anomapaññaṃ.
Tāhaṃ kusalaṃ karitvāna kammaṃ, tidasānaṃ sahabyataṃ gato’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Acchariyaṃ vata abbhutaṃ vata, añjalikammassa ayamīdiso vipāko;
content.gathalast: Ahampi muditamano pasannacitto, ajjeva buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ vajāmī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ajjeva buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ vajāhi, dhammañca saṅghañca pasannacitto;
content.gathalast: Tatheva sikkhāya padāni pañca, akhaṇḍaphullāni samādiyassu.
Amajjapo mā ca musā bhaṇāhi, sakena dārena ca hohi tuṭṭho’’ti.
Karomi tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ, tvaṃsi ācariyo mamāti.
Saṅghañca naradevassa, gacchāmi saraṇaṃ ahaṃ.
Amajjapo no ca musā bhaṇāmi, sakena dārena ca homi tuṭṭho’’ti.
content.gatha1: pe. va. 604 Suṇotha yakkhassa ca vāṇijāna ca, samāgamo yattha tadā ahosi;
content.gathalast: Yathā kathaṃ itaritarena cāpi, subhāsitaṃ tañca suṇātha sabbe.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yo so ahu rājā pāyāsi nāmanāmo , bhummānaṃ sahabyagato yasassī;
content.gathalast: So modamānova sake vimāne, amānuso mānuse ajjhabhāsīti.
Suduggame vaṇṇupathassa majjhe, vaṅkaṃ bhayādhaṅkaṃbhayā naṭṭhamanā manussā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Nayidha phalā mūlamayā ca santi, upādānaṃ natthi kutodha bhakkho;
content.gathalast: Aññatra paṃsūhi ca vālukāhi ca, tatāhi uṇhāhi ca dāruṇāhi ca.
Luddānamāvāsamidaṃ purāṇaṃ, bhūmippadeso abhisattarūpo.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Atha tumhe kenakena nukena nu vaṇṇena, kimāsamānā imaṃ padesaṃ hi;
content.gathalast: Anupaviṭṭhā sahasā samecca, lobhā bhayā atha vā sampamūḷhā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Magadhesu aṅgesu ca satthavāhā, āropayitvā paṇiyaṃ puthuttaṃ;
content.gathalast: Te yāmase sindhusovīrabhūmiṃ, dhanatthikā uddayaṃ patthayānā.
Etena vegena āyāma sabbesabbe te , rattiṃ maggaṃ paṭipannā vikāle.
Suduggame vaṇṇupathassa majjhe, disaṃ na jānāma pamūḷhacittā.
Tatuttariṃ jīvitamāsamānā, disvā patītā sumanā udaggā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Pāraṃ samuddassa imañca vaṇṇuṃvanaṃvaṇṇaṃ , vettācaraṃvettaṃ paraṃvettācāraṃ saṅkupathañca maggaṃ;
content.gathalast: Nadiyo pana pabbatānañca duggā, puthuddisā gacchatha bhogahetu.
Yaṃ vo sutaṃ vā atha vāpi diṭṭhaṃ, accherakaṃ taṃ vo suṇoma tātā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Itopi accherataraṃ kumāra, na to sutaṃ vā atha vāpi diṭṭhaṃ;
content.gathalast: Atītamānussakameva sabbaṃ, disvāna tappāma anomavaṇṇaṃ.
Dumā cimedumā ca tedumā ca te niccaphalūpapannā, atīva gandhā surabhiṃ pavāyanti.
Masāragallā sahalohitaṅgā, thambhā ime jotirasāmayāse.
Ratanantaraṃ kañcanavedimissaṃ, tapanīyapaṭṭehi ca sādhuchannaṃ.
Daḷho ca vaggu ca susaṅgato cavaggu sumukho susaṅgato , atīva nijjhānakhamo manuñño.
Murajaālambaratūriyaghuṭṭho, abhivanditosi thutivandanāya.
Acintiyo sabbaguṇūpapanno, rājā yathā vessavaṇo naḷinyānaḷiññaṃ .
content.gatha1: ‘‘Devo nu āsi udavāsi yakkho, udāhu devindo manussabhūto;
content.gathalast: Pucchanti taṃ vāṇijā satthavāhā, ācikkha ko nāma tuvaṃsi yakkho’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Serīsakoserissakoserissako nāma ahamhi yakkho, kantāriyo vaṇṇupathamhi gutto;
content.gathalast: Imaṃ padesaṃ abhipālayāmi, vacanakaro vessavaṇassa rañño’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Adhiccaladdhaṃ pariṇāmajaṃ te, sayaṃ kataṃ udāhu devehi dinnaṃ;
content.gathalast: Pucchanti taṃ vāṇijā satthavāhā, kathaṃ tayā laddhamidaṃ manuñña’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Nādhiccaladdhaṃ na pariṇāmajaṃ me, na sayaṃ kataṃ na hi devehi dinnaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sakehi kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ manuñña’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kiṃ te vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, kissa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
content.gathalast: Pucchanti taṃ vāṇijā satthavāhā, kathaṃ tayā laddhamidaṃ vimāna’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mamaṃ pāyāsīti ahu samaññā, rajjaṃ yadā kārayiṃ kosalānaṃ;
content.gathalast: Natthikadiṭṭhi kadariyo pāpadhammo, ucchedavādī ca tadā ahosiṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Samaṇo ca kho āsi kumārakassapo, bahussuto cittakathī uḷāro;
content.gathalast: So me tadā dhammakathaṃ abhāsiakāsi , diṭṭhivisūkāni vinodayī me.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tāhaṃ tassa tāhaṃ (ka.) dhammakathaṃ suṇitvā, upāsakattaṃ paṭivedayissaṃ;
content.gatha2: Pāṇātipātā virato ahosiṃ, loke adinnaṃ parivajjayissaṃ;
content.gathalast: Amajjapo no ca musā abhāṇiṃ, sakena dārena ca ahosi tuṭṭho.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, tassa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
content.gathalast: Teheva kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ vimāna’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Saccaṃ kirāhaṃsu narā sapaññā, anaññathā vacanaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ;
content.gathalast: Yahiṃ yahiṃ gacchati puññakammo, tahiṃ tahiṃ modati kāmakāmī.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yahiṃ yahiṃ sokapariddavo ca, vadho ca bandho ca parikkileso;
content.gathalast: Tahiṃ tahiṃ gacchati pāpakammo, na muccati duggatiyā kadācī’’ti.
Janassimassa tuyhañca kumāra, appaccayo kena nu kho ahosī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ime ca sirīsavanāime sirīsūpavanā caimepi sirīsavanā caimepi sirīsavanā ca tātā, dibbādibbā cadibbā ca gandhā surabhīsurabhiṃsurabhiṃ sampavantisampavāyanti ;
content.gathalast: Te sampavāyanti imaṃ vimānaṃ, divā ca ratto ca tamaṃ nihantvā.
Mānussakaṃ vassasataṃ atītaṃ, yadagge kāyamhi idhūpapanno.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Disvānahaṃ vassasatāni pañca, asmiṃ vimāne ṭhatvāna tātā;
content.gathalast: Āyukkhayā puññakkhayā cavissaṃ, teneva sokena pamucchitosmī’’tisamucchitosmī’’tisamucchitosmī’’ti .
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kathaṃ nu soceyya tathāvidho so, laddhā vimānaṃ atulaṃ cirāya;
content.gathalast: Ye cāpi kho ittaramupapannā, te nūna soceyyuṃ parittapuññā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Anucchaviṃ ovadiyañca me taṃ, yaṃ maṃ tumhe peyyavācaṃ vadetha;
content.gathalast: Tumhe ca kho tātā mayānuguttā, yenicchakaṃ tena paletha sotthi’’nti.
Yathāpayogā paripuṇṇacāgā, kāhāma serīsamahaṃ uḷāra’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mā ceva serīsamahaṃ akattha, sabbañca vo bhavissati yaṃ vadetha;
content.gathalast: Pāpāni kammāni vivajjayātha, dhammānuyogañca adhiṭṭhahātha.
Saddho ca cāgī ca supesalo ca, vicakkhaṇo santusito mutīmā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sañjānamāno na musā bhaṇeyya, parūpaghātāya na cetayeyya;
content.gathalast: Vebhūtikaṃ pesuṇaṃ no kareyya, saṇhañca vācaṃ sakhilaṃ bhaṇeyya.
So mātaraṃ pitarañcāpi jantu, dhammena poseti ariyavutti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Maññe so mātāpitūnaṃ kāraṇā, bhogāni pariyesati na attahetu;
content.gathalast: Mātāpitūnañca yo so (?) accayena, nekkhammapoṇo carissati brahmacariyaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ujū avaṅko asaṭho amāyo, na lesakappena ca vohareyya;
content.gathalast: So tādiso sukatakammakārī, dhamme ṭhito kinti labhetha dukkhaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ kāraṇā pātukatomhi attanā, tasmā dhammaṃ passatha vāṇijāse;
content.gatha2: Aññatra teniha bhasmībhasmibhasma bhavetha, andhākulā vippanaṭṭhā araññe;
content.gathalast: Taṃ khippamānena lahuṃ parena, sukho have sappurisena saṅgamo’’ti.
content.gatha2: Kiṃ nāmadheyyaṃ kiṃ pana tassa gottaṃ;
content.gatha3: Mayampi naṃ daṭṭhukāmamha yakkha, yassānukampāya idhāgatosi;
content.gathalast: Lābhā hi tassa, yassa tuvaṃ pihesī’’ti.
content.gatha2: Upāsako kocchaphalūpajīvī;
content.gathalast: Mā kho naṃ hīḷittha supesalo so’’ti.
content.gatha2: Na kho naṃ jānāma sa edisoti;
content.gathalast: Sutvāna tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ uḷāra’’nti.
content.gatha2: Daharā mahantā athavāpi majjhimā;
content.gathalast: Passantu puññānaṃ phalaṃ kadariyā’’ti.
content.gatha2: Taṃ kappakaṃ tattha purakkhatvāpurakkhipitvā ;
content.gathalast: Masakkasāraṃ viya vāsavassa.
content.gatha1: Te tattha sabbeva ‘ahaṃ pure’ti, upāsakattaṃ paṭivedayiṃsu;
content.gatha2: Pāṇātipātā viratā ahesuṃ, loke adinnaṃ parivajjayiṃsu;
content.gathalast: Amajjapā no ca musā bhaṇiṃsu, sakena dārena ca ahesuṃ tuṭṭhā.
content.gatha1: Te tattha sabbeva ‘ahaṃ pure’ti, upāsakattaṃ paṭivedayitvā;
content.gathalast: Pakkāmi sattho anumodamāno, yakkhiddhiyā anumato punappunaṃ.
Yathāpayogā paripuṇṇalābhā, paccāgamuṃ pāṭaliputtamakkhataṃ.
content.gatha2: Puttehi dārehi samaṅgibhūtā;
Akaṃsu serīsamahaṃ uḷāraṃ;
content.gathalast: Serīsakaṃ te pariveṇaṃ māpayiṃsu.
content.gatha2: Mahatthikā dhammaguṇāna sevanā;
content.gathalast: Sabbeva sattā sukhitāsukhinosukhino ahesunti.
Kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tatthacchasi pivasi khādasi ca, dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃ;
content.gathalast: Dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañca, nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇachannā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kena tetādiso vaṇṇo, kena te idha mijjhati;
content.gathalast: Uppajjanti ca te bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā.
Kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti.
Pañhaṃ puṭṭho viyākāsi, yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ.
Mahiddhiko camhi mahānubhāvo, dibbehi kāmehi samaṅgibhūto.
content.gatha2: Tena me idha mijjhati;
content.gathalast: Ye keci manaso piyā.
content.gatha2: Manussabhūto yamahaṃ akāsiṃ;
content.gathalast: Vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti.
content.gatha2: Anekavaṇṇamaṭṭhakuṇḍalī, serīsako sunikkhittaṃ;
content.gathalast: Purisānaṃ tatiyo vaggo pavuccatīti.
